The 4 cheese pizza is one of the most consumed in the world, of course, by cheese lovers. But be careful, because if we follow the traditional recipe, not just any cheese will do; in fact, the four cheeses used have the Protected Designation of Origin (PDO) certification: Fontina cheese, originally from Valle dAosta; gorgonzola cheese, natural from Milan; Parmesan cheese, originally from the city of Parma; and mozzarella cheese, born in Campania. With these four protagonists you will have in your hands an authentic cheese-making perdition in the form of a pizza. It has no more, no tomato sauce or spices, maybe a touch of ground black pepper.

As its name indicates, the star ingredient of this pizza is barbecue sauce or BBQ sauce. It is a pizza born in the United States, but it has become the favorite of many people for being juicy and one of the most intense and powerful. Along with the barbecue sauce, the barbecue pizza is made with minced meat and, at the diners choice, with onion, which provides a unique flavor contrast with the rest of the ingredients. Although Italy will always be the queen of pizza, the United States is not far behind in terms of consumption; so much so that the North Americans even have their Pizza National Day, a holiday instituted by Congress that is celebrated on February 9th.

The calzone is a special pizza because it hides all its ingredients inside (cheese, meat, tuna, vegetables, etc.), since it is covered by another dough the same size as the base, and in the shape of a dumpling. This wrapped pizza, originally from the city of Puglia (Naples), always maintains its juiciness and, after pasta and classic pizza, it has become one of the best-known and most versioned dishes in Italy.

Not suitable for the most delicate palates, the Diavola pizza is distinguished by the spicy flavor of its sauce, which should be noticed in each bite. But also the rest of the ingredients, which further enhance that fiery touch: chorizo, salami, even chili and a generous amount of cheese with character. The American version of this pizza replaces the salami with pepperoni, a variety of Italian sausage that is also spicy but with a more smoky flavor and seasoned with paprika or chili.

The margherita pizza is the most classic of Italian pizzas and the one that paved the way for the rest of the pizzas that were later made. The ingredients of this pioneer do not fail, and are the favorites of true lovers of traditional pizza: tomato sauce, mozzarella, basil, oregano and olive oil. What do the colors of these ingredients remind you of? Yes, to the Italian flag; a taste of flag.

The integration of pineapple with meat is more common in America than in Europe. The final result of such a combination is well worth trying, as it brings a juiciness to the whole that is difficult to achieve with other recipes. Some of its ingredients are: Beef, Sliced Serrano Ham, Natural Pineapple, Gouda Cheese, Virgin Olive Oil, Salt and Ground Black Pepper.
One of the most famous burgers in New York. Shake Shacks classic burger, single or double. All hamburgers of this type are made of beef and to accompany it, the famous curly fries.

Minced beef, bread soaked in milk, egg, pork bacon and other seasonings form the basis of excellent flavor. This is a super juicy burger that will always be a hit with those who try it. Among the ingredients of this delight we find: sliced bread, veal, Provencal herbs, Dijon mustard, ground black pepper and virgin olive oil.

If you prefer white meats instead of red, then you can choose a chicken burger. Some think that these, compared to beef, are too "sweet" or in some cases even somewhat tasteless. For this reason, you have to try the chicken ranch hamburger, since it is anything but sweet or tasteless. It is accompanied by a good tomato sauce and fried onion, as well as some beans and several strips of bacon.
The calamari sandwich is one of the most representative dishes of Madrid cuisine. Together with Madrid-style tripe and Madrid stew, it is the best dish we can find in Madrid.

The grilled ham and cheese sandwich, mixed sandwich, also known as bikini in Catalonia, is one of the most popular and easy to prepare. However, as silly as it may seem, there are many tricks behind this basic recipe. For example, making cheese perfectly melted without burning the bread or making bread crisp without dripping with grease or being squashed like rolling papers.
